item.title: How to use Ansible to deploy with git
item.description: Basic Ansible example on deploying with git. vars.yml --- # Update this to your own settings project_name: test project_root: /var/www/test project_repo: git@github.com:miguelmota/test-repo.git handlers.yml: --- - name: restart web server action: command echo "do something" sudo_user: root deploy.yml: date: 2014-06-13T00:00:00-00:00 draft: false --- - hosts: servers vars_files: - vars.yml gather_facts: false sudo: true sudo_user: root user: root tasks: - name: Pull sources from the repository. git: repo={{project_repo}} dest={{project_root}} version={{branch}} notify: - restart web server handlers: - include : handlers.
